name.title: name of the template
name.description: Name is a short summary of what the template does

author.title: author of the template
author.description: Author is the author of the template

description.title: description of the template
description.description: In-depth explanation on what the template does
examples: Bower is a package manager which stores package information in the bower.json file

metadata.title: additional metadata for the template
metadata.description: Additional metadata fields for the template

remediation.title: remediation steps for the template
remediation.description: In-depth explanation on how to fix the issues found by the template
examples: Change the default administrative username and password of Apache ActiveMQ by editing the file jetty-realm.properties

severity.Holder.title: severity of the template
severity.Holder.description: Seriousness of the implications of the template

kval.title: kval pairs to extract from response
kval.description: Kval pairs to extract from response

json.title: json jq expressions to extract data
json.description: JSON JQ expressions to evaluate from response part

xpath.title: html xpath expressions to extract data
xpath.description: XPath allows using xpath expressions to extract items from html response

attribute.title: optional attribute to extract from xpath
attribute.description: Optional attribute to extract from response XPath

part.title: part of response to extract data from
part.description: Part of the request response to extract data from

internal.title: mark extracted value for internal variable use
internal.description: Internal when set to true will allow using the value extracted in the next request for some protocols

part.title: part of response to match
part.description: Part of response to match data from

negative.title: negative specifies if match reversed
negative.description: Negative specifies if the match should be reversed. It will only match if the condition is not true

status.title: status to match
status.description: Status to match for the response

size.title: acceptable size for response
size.description: Size is the acceptable size for the response

words.title: words to match in response
words.description: Words contains word patterns required to be present in the response part

regex.title: regex to match in response
regex.description: Regex contains regex patterns required to be present in the response part

binary.title: binary patterns to match in response
binary.description: Binary are the binary patterns required to be present in the response part

dsl.title: dsl expressions to match in response
dsl.description: DSL are the dsl expressions that will be evaluated as part of nuclei matching rules

encoding.title: encoding for word field
encoding.description: Optional encoding for the word fields

dns.DNSRequestTypeHolder.title: type of DNS request to make
dns.DNSRequestTypeHolder.description: Type is the type of DNS request to make,enum=A,enum=NS,enum=DS,enum=CNAME,enum=SOA,enum=PTR,enum=MX,enum=TXT,enum=AAAA

matchers.title: matchers to run on response
matchers.description: Detection mechanism to identify whether the request was successful by doing pattern matching

extractors.title: extractors to run on response
extractors.description: Extractors contains the extraction mechanism for the request to identify and extract parts of the response

id.title: id of the dns request
id.description: ID is the optional ID of the DNS Request

name.title: hostname to make dns request for
name.description: Name is the Hostname to make DNS request for

type.title: type of dns request to make
type.description: Type is the type of DNS request to make

class.title: class of DNS request
class.description: Class is the class of the DNS request

retries.title: retries for dns request
retries.description: Retries is the number of retries for the DNS request

trace.title: trace operation
trace.description: Trace performs a trace operation for the target.

trace-max-recursion.title: trace-max-recursion level for dns request
trace-max-recursion.description: TraceMaxRecursion is the number of max recursion allowed for trace operations

recursion.title: recurse all servers
recursion.description: Recursion determines if resolver should recurse all records to get fresh results

resolvers.title: Resolvers
resolvers.description: Define resolvers to use within the template

matchers.title: matchers to run on response
matchers.description: Detection mechanism to identify whether the request was successful by doing pattern matching

extractors.title: extractors to run on response
extractors.description: Extractors contains the extraction mechanism for the request to identify and extract parts of the response

extensions.title: extensions to match
extensions.description: List of extensions to perform matching on

denylist.title: extensions to deny match
denylist.description: List of file extensions to deny during matching

id.title: id of the request
id.description: ID is the optional ID for the request

max-size.title: max size data to run request on
max-size.description: Maximum size of the file to run request on

no-recursive.title: do not perform recursion
no-recursive.description: Specifies whether to not do recursive checks if folders are provided

id.title: id of the request
id.description: Optional ID of the headless request

steps.title: list of actions for headless request
steps.description: List of actions to run for headless request

matchers.title: matchers to run on response
matchers.description: Detection mechanism to identify whether the request was successful by doing pattern matching

extractors.title: extractors to run on response
extractors.description: Extractors contains the extraction mechanism for the request to identify and extract parts of the response

args.title: arguments for headless action
args.description: Args contain arguments for the headless action

name.title: name for headless action
name.description: Name is the name assigned to the headless action

http.HTTPMethodTypeHolder.title: method is the HTTP request method

matchers.title: matchers to run on response
matchers.description: Detection mechanism to identify whether the request was successful by doing pattern matching

extractors.title: extractors to run on response
extractors.description: Extractors contains the extraction mechanism for the request to identify and extract parts of the response

path.title: path(s) for the http request
path.description: Path(s) to send http requests to

name.title: name for the http request
name.description: Optional name for the HTTP Request

attack.title: attack is the payload combination
attack.description: Attack is the type of payload combinations to perform

method.title: method is the http request method
method.description: Method is the HTTP Request Method

body.title: body is the http request body
body.description: Body is an optional parameter which contains HTTP Request body

payloads.title: payloads for the http request
payloads.description: Payloads contains any payloads for the current request

headers.title: headers to send with the http request
headers.description: Headers contains HTTP Headers to send with the request

race_count.title: number of times to repeat request in race condition
race_count.description: Number of times to send a request in Race Condition Attack

max-redirects.title: maximum number of redirects to follow
max-redirects.description: Maximum number of redirects that should be followed

pipeline-concurrent-connections.title: number of pipelining connections
pipeline-concurrent-connections.description: Number of connections to create during pipelining

pipeline-requests-per-connection.title: number of requests to send per pipelining connections
pipeline-requests-per-connection.description: Number of requests to send per connection when pipelining

threads.title: threads for sending requests
threads.description: Threads specifies number of threads to use sending requests. This enables Connection Pooling

max-size.title: maximum http response body size
max-size.description: Maximum size of http response body to read in bytes

cookie-reuse.title: optional cookie reuse enable
cookie-reuse.description: Optional setting that enables cookie reuse

redirects.title: follow http redirects
redirects.description: Specifies whether redirects should be followed by the HTTP Client

pipeline.title: perform HTTP 1.1 pipelining
pipeline.description: Pipeline defines if the attack should be performed with HTTP 1.1 Pipelining

unsafe.title: use rawhttp non-strict-rfc client
unsafe.description: Unsafe specifies whether to use rawhttp engine for sending Non RFC-Compliant requests

race.title: perform race-http request coordination attack
race.description: Race determines if all the request have to be attempted at the same time (Race Condition)

req-condition.title: preserve request history
req-condition.description: Automatically assigns numbers to requests and preserves their history

stop-at-first-match.title: stop at first match
stop-at-first-match.description: Stop the execution after a match is found

skip-variables-check.title: skip variable checks
skip-variables-check.description: Skips the check for unresolved variables in request

data.title: data to send as input
data.description: Data is the data to send as the input

type.title: type is the type of input data
type.description: Type of input specified in data field

read.title: bytes to read from socket
read.description: Number of bytes to read from socket

name.title: optional name for data read
name.description: Optional name of the data read to provide matching on

network.NetworkInputTypeHolder.title: type is the type of input data
network.NetworkInputTypeHolder.description: description=Type of input specified in data field,enum=hex,enum=text

host.title: host to send requests to
host.description: Host to send network requests to

attack.title: attack is the payload combination
attack.description: Attack is the type of payload combinations to perform

payloads.title: payloads for the network request
payloads.description: Payloads contains any payloads for the current request

inputs.title: inputs for the network request
inputs.description: Inputs contains any input/output for the current request

read-size.title: size of network response to read
read-size.description: Size of response to read at the end. Default is 1024 bytes

read-all.title: read all response stream
read-all.description: Read all response stream till the server stops sending
